external.gw.api.graph

Interface Tree<T>

  • Deprecated. 
    External entities are deprecated. Please use the new Java API instead.

    @Deprecated
public interface Tree<T>
    Represents a tree as a specialized form of a graph.

    • Nested Class Summary

      static class  Tree.CONSTRUCT
      Deprecated. 
      Utility class for initializing an instance of external.gw.api.graph.Tree
